short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Measure the Carbon Emissions of your Retail Purchases

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With CarbonCheck, you can discover products that are sustainable and better for the environment for every product category on amazon.com. 

Make Sustainable Shopping Choices that don't burn a hole in your wallet. 

Key Features:

üåç Understand Product Footprint
Make informed purchases with our groundbreaking AI-powered Carbon Model. It calculates a single, easy-to-understand Carbon Score for millions of products, capturing all greenhouse gas emissions throughout the product's lifecycle. Each product receives a rating‚ÄîExcellent, Good, Fair, or Poor‚Äîbased on its Carbon Score. Choose "Excellent" rated products for a sustainable lifestyle, and understand the environmental impact of "Poor" rated ones.

üí° Make Sustainable Choices
Navigate your shopping decisions effortlessly with our intelligent recommendations engine, Carbon Light. Compare similar products on two critical fronts: price and environmental impact. Carbon Light analyzes products across multiple categories, empowering you to not only make smarter product choices but also inspiring lifestyle changes. For instance, if you're searching for dairy milk, you'll see Carbon Scores for alternative milk options as well.

Make the smart choice for you and the planet. Add CarbonCheck to your Chrome browser today!
